name: Tinge
description:
Tinge is a fast arcade puzzlish game where all you do is rotate a triangle to match its edges' colors with the color of the balls coming at them.

30 levels to pass using only mouse buttons with super easy controls - left mouse button to move the triangle counterclockwise and right mouse button to move it clockwise. Each edge is of a certain color and there are 4 corners that project balls of paint. Move the triangle fast to match as much balls as you can and pass all the levels.
